name: Deleter Robot
description: Telegram bot to delete service messages.

API_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org or @APIinfoBot

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org or @APIinfoBot

BOT_TOKEN.description: Obtain a Telegram bot token by contacting @BotFather

OWNER_ID.description: Get your id by sending /id to @MissMiley_bot. Fill only if you filled OWNER_NAME.

OWNER_NAME.description: Your name (to show as owner).Fill only if you filled OWNER_ID.
